title: 06/15/21 DPS Hour 3 Reggie Miller
itunes:title: 06/15/21 DPS Hour 3 Reggie Miller
description:
Reggie Miller talks to Dan about the NBA looking into offensive players initiating and seeking out contact. Reggie says it will be too hard for officials to judge with the fast pace of the game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
